targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "watermaker.spectra.productWaterFlowrate" WHERE $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT median("value") / 100000 FROM "autogen"."watermaker.spectra.feedWaterPressure" WHERE $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT median("value") / 100000 FROM "autogen"."watermaker.spectra.boostPressure" WHERE $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT median("value") FROM "autogen"."watermaker.spectra.productWaterSalinity" WHERE $timeFilter AND value > 0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
